name: @veaba/qrcode-wasm
description: WebAssembly QRCode generator - Unified API with qrcode-js

scripts.build:wasm: wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg && node scripts/fix-pkg.js
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:node: wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir pkg && node scripts/fix-pkg.js
scripts.build:bundler: wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir pkg && node scripts/fix-pkg.js

author: veaba
